title: Random Freeze Frames for 10 seconds to over 1 minute
body: Not a long time ago, i got this Freeze Frames coming up in my games for 10 sec to 1 min or more and they are really fruastrating. And it appears only  in league of legends, so i dont even know... I would appreciate some help, if someone has the same problem or knows how to fix it :D

replies.body: Drops in your frame rate can be caused to a variety of things, like outdated drivers or bad game files.  Check out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a list of instructions to tune up your PC.  This should help you out!
